name: Rainbow Animals
description:
Play with Rainbow Animals, endless version of the game Transition (winner of category Attendee Choice on Bratislava Game Jam 2016).

Rainbow Animals needs to go on platforms with the same colors as they are wearing.

Help Rainbow Animals find the right platforms and avoid to obstacles. But you have to be quick, because time runs out!

How far can you go with your Rainbow Animals? :)

Music:

Master of the Feast Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
